verses.verse: We <S%G1161>then,<s%> as workers <S%G4903>together<s%> with him, <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> that <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3004>saith,<s%> I have <S%G1873>heard<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%> in a <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G1184>accepted,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%> have I <S%G997>succored<s%> <S%G4671>thee:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2144>accepted<s%> <S%G2540>time;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.)<s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> right <S%G1188>hand<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> on the <S%G710>left,<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> for a <S%G489>recompense<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> same, <S%G846>I<s%> <S%G3004>(speak<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto my <S%G5043>children,)<s%> be <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4115>enlarged.<s%>

Be <S%G1096><s%> ye <S%G3361>not<s%> unequally yoked <S%G2086>together<s%> with <S%G571>unbelievers:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3352>fellowship<s%> hath <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G458>unrighteousness?<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2842>communion<s%> hath <S%G5457>light<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G4655>darkness?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4857>concord<s%> hath <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G955>Belial?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> what <S%G3310>part<s%> hath he that <S%G4103>believeth<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> an <S%G571>infidel?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4783>agreement<s%> hath the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1497>idols?<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G2036>said,<s%> I will <S%G1774>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> walk <S%G1704>in<s%> them; <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> come <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be ye <S%G873>separate,<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> thing; and <S%G2504>I<s%> will <S%G1523>receive<s%> <S%G5209>you.<s%>
